mapper.select: select p.id, url ,p.descript, p.status from t_permission p, t_role_permission rp, t_user_role ur where ur.username = #{username} and ur.role_id = rp.role_id and rp.perm_id = p.id
select r.id, r.role, r.descript, r.status from t_role r ,t_user_role ur where ur.username = #{username} and ur.role_id = r.id
